Uses of Interface
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction

Packages that use ObjectiveFunction
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
net.tvburger.jdl.knn
Provides the implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers
Contains the neural network optimizer algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss
Provides the different loss functions used for training
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
Provides the different regimes for training
net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)

    void
    DumpNodesRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function with the wrapped regime and dumps the network nodes before and/or after training.

    void
    EpochRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function by repeatedly delegating to the wrapped regime for the configured number of epochs.
    <E extends EstimationFunction>
    void
    MiniBatchRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function by splitting the dataset into mini-batches of size BatchSizeConfigurable.getBatchSize() and delegating each batch to the underlying BatchRegime.
    <E extends EstimationFunction>
    void
    ObjectiveReportingRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function using the wrapped regime and reports the aggregated loss before and after training.
    <E extends EstimationFunction>
    void
    OnlineRegime.train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer)
    Trains the given estimation function in an online manner by iterating over each sample in the dataset and invoking the optimizer immediately for each one.
